posts.post_content:
Trying to complete the set.  Looking for the following cards in a SGC 40 grade (and fairly centered).  Please send me a picture of the card along with what you want to sell the card for if interested in selling.  I can send payment quickly via paypal.

Ellam, Roy
Foster, Ed
Hickman, Gordon
Hooker, Bock
Revelle, Dutch
Shaughnessy, Shag

I have an extra SGC 40 Violat.  PM sent (as I do not see any email address).

Regards,
Adam
[url]aamoniz@yahoo.com[/url]
